author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...KAREN CONTINUES MOVING NORTHEASTWARD OVER THE NORTH ATLANTIC...
summary: ...KAREN CONTINUES MOVING NORTHEASTWARD OVER THE NORTH ATLANTIC... As of 9:00 AM GMT Fri Oct 10 the center of Karen was located near 45.3, -32.1 with movement NE at 9 mph. The minimum central pressure was 998 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...KAREN CONTINUES MOVING NORTHEASTWARD OVER THE NORTH ATLANTIC... As of 9:00 AM GMT Fri Oct 10 the center of Karen was located near 45.3, -32.1 with movement NE at 9 mph. The minimum central pressure was 998 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.

title: Summary - Subtropical Storm Karen (AT1/AL112025)
